Topic.Title: How do I make a game in a category?

Posts.EditableText: Sorry if this is not the right forum, but how do I put a category in a game I uploaded in textadventures.co.uk?
Posts.HTML: Sorry if this is not the right forum, but how do I put a category in a game I uploaded in textadventures.co.uk?

Posts.EditableText:
You can't.  Moderators do.  

Tip:  posting the same question in multiple threads is not helpful.
